ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Where to go
ygData.msgSnippet: Fighting gnolls in highpass (the passageway not the building) is a good way to go. You can pick up some cool stuff. Provided it s not over camped. If you get
ygData.messageBody:
Fighting gnolls in highpass (the passageway not the building) is a good way
to go. You can pick up some cool stuff. Provided it's not over camped. If
you get in a good group around lvl 18 you can take orcs-- but be careful,
they gang up something nasty. I was actually fighting orcs when I was lvl
13-- with my wizard. She would DS the people in group and occassionally get
in a good AE spell to draw attention off the cleric. Heh, I took to calling
one of my spells "Wizard Taunt" bc it would always get the mobs after me. I
suicided alot of times to save the cleric. But at lvl 13 and 14 it wasn't
too much of an xp loss.
But Blackburrow is still a nice place to stay for awhile. Elite ledge is a
nice place to hunt.
luv,
-Su

>
> Where to go to fight for a 15 Shaman? In Blackburrow now.
> Also what wisdom items and armour should I have
> Have some Lg.Ringmall and some ornate chain. Like the ornatechain weighs
less.
> Also have a lockjsw vest. Any help would be appreciated.
>
> Genila 15
> Povar
> Tammy
>
